text: The contemporaneous re - emergence of FPL in geographically distinct settings long considered FPL - free has raised questions as to whether virus - related or other unknown risk factors played a role in the observed FPL outbreaks . Herein , case data and clinical samples from 989 and 113 cats , respectively , were analysed to identify the lineages of Carnivore protoparvovirus 1 responsible for the outbreaks of FPL in Australia ( 2014 to 2018 ) , the UAE ( 2017 ) and NZ ( 2017 - 2018 ) and evaluate epidemiological factors associated with these outbreaks , including vaccination status .
